nodes.text: Imperial Intelligence and Security Bureau offices

The Imperial Intelligence and Security Bureau offices were a series of offices that were located in the Citadel Tower of the Imperial security complex on the Outer Rim planet Scarif, which belonged to the Galactic Empire's Imperial Intelligence and Imperial Security Bureau organizations. The RA-7 protocol droid 4D6-J-A7 served as an administrative assistant in the Imperial Office of Security, one of the offices in the facility. The droid was often exposed to classified information while stationed there.

In 0 BBY, during the Battle of Scarif, the entire tower, which included the offices, was destroyed by the Death Star superweapon on the orders of Grand Moff Wilhuff Tarkin, so that the Death Star plans stored within the Citadel Tower's vault would not fall into the hands of the Rebel Alliance.

The Imperial Intelligence and Security Bureau offices were first mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Rogue One: The Ultimate Visual Guide, which was authored by Pablo Hidalgo and published by Dorling Kindersley.
